content.statement1: Get ready for the big surprise! Our new website is launching soon, and we will reveal our amazing new headquarters, with incredible prices and exclusive discounts.
content.statement2: Register your details now and specify the programming service you need to get a special discount.Don't miss the opportunity!

validation.noNumbers: The username must not contain numbers.
validation.required: This field is required. Please make sure to fill it in.
validation.service: You must select the type of service you need.
validation.requiredName: The name field is required. Please enter your full name.
validation.invalidEmail: The email address you entered is invalid. Please provide a correct email format (e.g., name@example.com).
validation.invalidPhone: The phone number must contain digits only. Please enter a valid number without spaces or special characters.
